Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lankshire Parkway, west of the House of Hides.
Room.LongDescription: The large center on the east side of the road contains a number of small shops that might be of interest to some people. The shop directly to the east, called the House of Hides, is well known for their good leather and other hide armors for all races.
